data.title: Children's Book Lists
data.meta_description: Suggested Reading for KidsAdventure and Survival StoriesPicture Books (JJ)Long, Melinda. How I Became a Pirate. (JJ Long) hen Braid Beard's pirate crew invites Jeremy Jacob to join their voyage, he jumps right on board. Buried treasure, sea chanteys, pirate talk--who wouldn't...
data.text:
The first installment of taxes on the Grand List of Oct 1, 2023 are due and payable on July 1, 2024. Failure to pay any tax due July 1, 2024, on or before Aug 1, 2024, will cause the tax to become delinquent and subject to interest at the rate of 1.5% per month, back to the original due date of July 2024.

Click here for more information
